Package org.middleheaven.domain.store

DomainStore pattern support.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DomainStore Standard contract for data stores.
DomainStoreListener Listener for events on the DomainStore.
DomainStoreManager Controls the entity store state.
DomainStoreService A Service to register and retrieve DomainStores.
EntityInstance Abstraction of an entity instance.
EntityInstanceField An instance of an EntityInstance field.
EntityInstanceStorage Abstraction for a object mapping mechanism.
IdentityManager Provide Identity generation and assignement.
StorageUnit A unit of storage.
StoreActionCommiter

EnumType

HibernateEntityInstance  
LayzEntityCriteriaQuery<T>  
MetaBeanEntityInstance EntityInstance implementation backed by a Map.
StoreAction An action to be performed on a DataStorage with a given object.
